author: Simon Difford
description: Spicy rye whiskey with a hint of absinthe smoothed by thick meringue-like lemony egg white.
name: Rattlesnake
recipeIngredient: 52.5 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
